name: Kaptain Karate
description:
Master One-Handed Karate with One Attack Button!

Easy Recommended

  • Left Click - Attack
  • To Block, just do not press Left Click
  • The longer you hold Attack, the more you charge your Punch
  • If you attack an enemy that is blocking they will Parry you
  • A fully charged Punch can break an enemy's guard
  • If you press Attack at the same time as an enemy atttacks you, you will Parry their attack and Stun them.
  • If an enemy lights red then they are performing an Unblockable Attack, you must hit them before they hit you.

If your game is lagging, set Graphics to Low.

Thank you for playing and remember to vote for your favorite entries!
